\documentclass{article}
\begin{document}

%C x=(2.23|1.99)
%r 2.23+/-1.99
\begin{calc}
def foo(x):
	y=x**2
	return y

z=33
#r 33
foo(z)
#r 1089
\end{calc}

%C B=(0.078821756433056|0.00019311935401873)
%r 0.0788217564331+/-0.000193119354019
%C A=-(0.0058425962025917|0.00053680687862343)
%r -0.00584259620259+/-0.000536806878623

$$
\val[5]{x} =
\val{x} =
@x@ =
@x,3@ $$

\begin{calc}
u=f(4.39,0.01)
#r 4.39+/-0.01
i=f(4.295,0.005)
#r 4.295+/-0.005

p=(u**2-(2*i/u))
#r 17.3153801822+/-0.0922853378939


y=meanval([15.,17.,13.,19.,4.])
#r 13.6+/-5.2
\end{calc}

$$ P=\val[1]{p} $$
$$ U=\val[1]{u} $$
$$ M = \val{y} $$





\end{document}
